verses.verse: To the chief <WH5329> Musician, <WH5329> to Jeduthun, <WH3038> A Psalm <WH4210> of David. <WH1732> Truly <WH389> my soul <WH5315> waits <WH1747> on God: <WH430> from him comes my salvation. <WH3444>
He only <WH389> is my rock <WH6697> and my salvation; <WH3444> he is my defense; <WH4869> I shall not be greatly <WH7227> moved. <WH4131>

How <WH5704> long <WH5704> will you imagine <WH2050> mischief <WH205> against <WH5921> a man? <WH376> you shall be slain <WH7523> all <WH3605> of you: as a bowing <WH5186> wall <WH7023> shall you be, and as a tottering <WH1760> fence. <WH1447>

They only <WH389> consult <WH3289> to cast <WH5080> him down from his excellency: <WH7613> they delight <WH7521> in lies: <WH3576> they bless <WH1288> with their mouth, <WH6310> but they curse <WH7043> inwardly. <WH7130> Selah. <WH5542>
My soul, <WH5315> wait <WH1826> you only <WH389> on God; <WH430> for my expectation <WH8615> is from him.
He only <WH389> is my rock <WH6697> and my salvation: <WH3444> he is my defense; <WH4869> I shall not be moved. <WH4131>
In God <WH430> is my salvation <WH3468> and my glory: <WH3519> the rock <WH6697> of my strength, <WH5797> and my refuge, <WH4268> is in God. <WH430>
Trust <WH982> in him at all <WH3605> times; <WH6256> you people, <WH5971> pour <WH8210> out your heart <WH3824> before <WH6440> him: God <WH430> is a refuge <WH4268> for us. Selah. <WH5542>

Surely <WH389> men <WH1121> <WH120> of low degree are vanity, <WH1892> and men <WH1121> <WH376> of high <WH376> degree are a lie: <WH3576> to be laid <WH5927> in the balance, <WH3976> they are altogether <WH3162> lighter <WH7043> than vanity. <WH1892>
Trust <WH982> not in oppression, <WH6233> and become <WH1891> not vain <WH1891> in robbery: <WH1498> if <WH3588> riches <WH2428> increase, <WH5107> set <WH7896> not your heart <WH3820> on them.
God <WH430> has spoken <WH1696> once; <WH259> twice <WH8147> have I heard <WH8085> this; <WH2098> that power <WH5797> belongs to God. <WH430>
Also to you, O Lord, <WH136> belongs mercy: <WH2617> for you render <WH7999> to every man <WH376> according to his work. <WH4639>
